page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER
page.content: P.C.Aspinall is the main policeman in Copmanthorpe.He always works on his own and he is the only policeman in the village.For transport he has a bike because he finds it easier to stop and talk to the public than he does in a car.If there was a serious crime in the village he wouldn't be able to tackle it himself,other policemen would be called in to help him.If it wasn't such a serious crime he would be able to do it himself.He isn't always at the police station he is normally riding round the village on his bike to check everything is alright.P.C.Aspinall lives in the village.Everybody in the village knows he can be contacted at home on the phone or if he is out and about they know he can be contacted by radio, P.C.Aspinall doesn't just work in Copmanthorpe he also works in Acaster.
